resources.string:
Sorry for the recent lack of updates. I promise to be better.

I hope you find the new app more intuitive, quicker and reliable. Some features will be missing at first, but I will slowly rebuild them. At least you can expect full offline access to your ratings.

Does that sound nice?
created by Eric Kok of 2312 development

Don't worry - they are safe.

All ratings you have uploading to RateBeer using the old app or entered directly on ratebeer.com are stored on the website. Very soon this app will allow you to log in again and view them. In fact, they will be fully synchronized for quick searching and available offline access when a connection is not available.

Any offline ratings you had made and not yet uploaded are still stored on your device, in the app' database. Very soon you will be able to see them again and upload them. Very soon, I promise!
Connection failure - your connection is poor or RateBeer is offline
Your username or password is incorrect
Both username and password are required fields to sign in
